title: Enhancing H2 yield from photoreforming of natural lignocellulose feedstock by two-stage thermo-alkaline hydrolysis pretreatment

Solar water splitting hydrogen efficiency can be increased substantially by adding natural lignocellulosic feedstock as a sacrificial agent in the process. However, the efficiency of hydrogen yield from photoreforming (PR)...
